simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes the memory poke command that will load a memory location with data specified in the command message.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_PokeCmd. This routine will write 8, 16, or 32 bits of data to a single ram address.

parameterdescription.para: A #MM_PokeCmd_t pointer to the poke command message
The destination address for the poke operation

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_PokeCmd. This routine will write 8, 16, or 32 bits of data to a single EEPROM address.

parameterdescription.para: A #MM_PokeCmd_t pointer to the poke command message
The destination address for the poke operation

briefdescription.para: Process load memory with interrupts disabled command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes the load memory with interrupts disabled command that will load up to MM_MAX_UNINTERRUPTABLE_DATA bytes into ram with interrupts disabled during the actual load

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Verify load memory with interrupts disabled parameters.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will run various checks on the destination address and data size (in bytes) for a load memory with interrupts disabled command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This command is only valid for ram addresses so no memory type checks are performed

parameterdescription.para: The destination address for the requested load operation
The number of bytes for the requested load operation

entry.para: Returns TRUE if all the parameter checks passed
Returns FALSE any parameter check failed

briefdescription.para: Process memory load from file command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes the memory load from file command that will read a file and store the data in the command specified address range of memory.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_LoadMemFromFileCmd. This routine will read a file and write the data to memory

parameterdescription.para: The open file handle of the load file
A pointer to a character string holding the load file name
A #MM_LoadDumpFileHeader_t pointer to the load file header structure
The destination address for the requested load operation

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the load completed successfully
Returns FALSE if the load failed due to an error

briefdescription.para: Verify load memory from file parameters.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will run various checks on the destination address, memory type, and data size (in bytes) for a load memory from file command

parameterdescription.para: The destination address for the requested load operation
The destination memory type for the requested load operation
The number of bytes for the requested load operation

entry.para: Returns TRUE if all the parameter checks passed
Returns FALSE any parameter check failed

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_LoadMemFromFileCmd. This routine will check if the size of a load file as reported by the filesystem is what it should be based upon the number of load bytes specified in the MM file header.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a character string holding the load file name
A #MM_LoadDumpFileHeader_t pointer to the load file header structure

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the load file size is as expected
Returns FALSE if the load file size is not as expected

briefdescription.para: Read the cFE primary and and MM secondary file headers.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_LoadMemFromFileCmd. This routine will read the cFE primary and MM secondary headers from the file specified by the FileHandle.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a character string holding the file name (used only for error event messages).
File Descriptor obtained from a previous call to OS_open that is associated with the file whose headers are to be read.
A CFE_FS_Header_t pointer to the cFE primary file header structure.
A #MM_LoadDumpFileHeader_t pointer to the MM secondary file header structure
Contents of the cFE primary file header structure for the specified file.
Contents of the MM secondary file header structure for the specified file.

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the headers were read successfully
Returns FALSE if a read error occurred

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes the memory fill command that will load an address range of memory with the command specified fill pattern

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_FillMemCmd. This routine will load memory with a command specified fill pattern

parameterdescription.para: The destination address for the fill operation
A #MM_FillMemCmd_t pointer to the fill command message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will run various checks on the destination address, memory type, and data size (in bytes) for a memory fill command

parameterdescription.para: The destination address for the requested fill operation
The destination memory type for the requested fill operation
The number of bytes to fill

entry.para: Returns TRUE if all the parameter checks passed
Returns FALSE any parameter check failed
